2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Aid
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Branding Smite
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack before this spell ends, the weapon gleams with astral radiance as you strike.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Find Steed
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You summon a loyal steed that serves you as a mount, allowing you to travel at a fast pace.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Lesser Restoration
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Locate Object
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Magic Weapon
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Protection from Poison
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison.

2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Zone of Truth
2ndLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range.
